metadata.title: CVE-2023-43091 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in GNOME Maps, which is vulnerable to a code injectionattack via its service.json configuration file. If the configuration fileis malicious, it may execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: gnome-maps package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
